meaningMnemonic: The <radical>rice</radical> radical and <kanji>rice</kanji> are the same in looks as well as in meaning. This also refers to "America," maybe because America is covered in rice or fields or something?
readingMnemonic: You've got tons of dry grains of <kanji>rice</kanji>. You have no idea what you're going to do with it. Then, you come up with a solution. All this dry rice could go towards filling up the <reading>bay</reading> (べい), so you have more land to farm on!
